Projectiles

Class SpiderShot

  • java.lang.Object
    • Projectiles.Projectile
      • Projectiles.SimpleShell
        • Projectiles.SpiderShot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeatedShot, Shrapnel

    public class SpiderShot
extends SimpleShell
    Class representing a SpiderShot type projectile. Extends SimpleShell.
    Author:
    Razvan Cojocaru

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpiderShot

        public SpiderShot(Screen screen,
          int ref,
          TimeManager currentTime)
        Simple constructor that calls the constructor of the superclass.
        Parameters:
        screen - to draw the shape onto.
        ref - reference parameter of the Projectile type.
        currentTime - TimeManager containing the time of launch of the projectile.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateNewRef

        protected int calculateNewRef(int dist,
                  int id)
        Calculate the new reference of a projectile as it travels towards the screen.
        Parameters:
        dist - distance traveled by the projectile.
        id - ID of the given projectile type (see calculateShapeChangingDist).
        Returns:
        new reference.

      • calculateShapeChangingDist

        protected int calculateShapeChangingDist(int id)
        Method used to find the shapeChangingDist for each projectile. ID: 1 TriGrapeShot 2 Carcass 3 CanisterShot 4 ChainShot 5 Shrapnel 6 HeatedShot 7 SpiderShot 8 SimpleShell
        Parameters:
        id - ID for the projectile type.
        Returns:
        Distance at which the projectile changes type.

      • hitScreenActionSpiderShot

        protected void hitScreenActionSpiderShot(Point shooterPosition,
                             int ref)
        Method used to draw the corresponding shape on the given screen. Draws a square.
        Parameters:
        shooterPosition - Center of gravity of the shape.
        ref - reference size of the shape.

      • shoot

        public void shoot(int dist,
         Point shooterPosition)
        Description copied from class: Projectile
        The action that takes place when the projectile is propagating. At each propagation step, the shape of the projectile changes due to the corrosive atmosphere
        Overrides:
        shoot in class SimpleShell
        Parameters:
        dist - distance between the shooter and the screen
        shooterPosition - the position from which the shooter fires
